thread.title: FIFA says 'working well' as African football chief Issa Hayatou takes charge
thread.title_full: FIFA says 'working well' as African football chief Issa Hayatou takes charge

title: FIFA says 'working well' as African football chief Issa Hayatou takes charge
text:
Sports News | 17 October 2015 14:25 CET FIFA says 'working well' as African football chief Issa Hayatou takes charge - www.ghanasoccernet.com Sepp Blatter and Issa Hayatou 
FIFA, engulfed by a wave of scandals, is still working well in operational terms, acting secretary general Markus Kattner said on Thursday as interim president Issa Hayatou assumed office to replace the suspended Sepp Blatter. 
Blatter was last week suspended for 90 days by FIFAâ€™s Ethics Committee along with secretary general Jerome Valcke and UEFA president Michel Platini, pending a full ethics investigation. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
